DOC.brief_summary: This is an open-study with a 26 week open label treatment period followed by an optional 26 week open label extension. The total treatment period will be 52 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy and Safety Study of ABT-SLV176 for the Treatment of Hypogonadal Men
DOC.criteria: Low testosterone Normal testosterone levels Elevated Prostatic Specific Antigen (PSA) History of breast or prostate cancer
